programme.title: Space Channel News
programme.desc: News from around the space industry, around the globe....and so much more. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movies
programme.desc: Time and space can get tricky when traveling through time and space. Duration: 3600

programme.title: 20 Million Miles to Earth
programme.desc: The first U.S. spaceship to Venus crash-lands off the coast of Sicily on its return trip. A dangerous, lizard-like creature comes with it and quickly grows gigantic. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Presents: The Original Flash Gordon S1 E9 & 10
programme.desc: Flash survives the tournament with Aura's help, after she discovers the weak point of the orangopoid. Still determined to win Flash, Aura has him drugged to make him lose his memory. Flash recovers his memory. Ming is determined to have Flash executed. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Dealers : Dealers on a Mission
programme.desc: Larry takes on an impossible mission: he’s been asked find an item worn in space by Apollo 15 legend Al Worden. It’s going to be tough but Larry is keen to succeed – if he pulls it off he gets to meet the great man himself. Torie searches for Russian space items for a museum in San Francisco. And Cole goes on the hunt for an item from Apollo 13 – his search takes him to Las Vegas and one of the biggest collectors in the space dealing world. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Without Warning
programme.desc: Sandy and Greg are teenagers who go camping, despite warnings not to, with their friends. They soon encounter aliens, who are using the area as a hunting ground. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Cosmic Vibrations
programme.desc: A musical and visual celebration of our connection with our home planet and the universe. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movies
programme.desc: In Cradle, Eade and her dad are on the return journey to earth when an explosion cripples the craft and seriously injures her father. In New Mars, a generation lives underground on Mars preparing to begin a new life as the colonists of a planet which is being terraformed into a new habitable world. Finally, Kaya Torres is circling a black hole in a pod. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Presents: The Original Flash Gordon S1 E9 & 10
programme.desc: Flash survives the tournament with Aura's help, after she discovers the weak point of the orangopoid. Still determined to win Flash, Aura has him drugged to make him lose his memory. Flash recovers his memory. Ming is determined to have Flash executed. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Dealers : Dealers on a Mission
programme.desc: Larry takes on an impossible mission: he’s been asked find an item worn in space by Apollo 15 legend Al Worden. It’s going to be tough but Larry is keen to succeed – if he pulls it off he gets to meet the great man himself. Torie searches for Russian space items for a museum in San Francisco. And Cole goes on the hunt for an item from Apollo 13 – his search takes him to Las Vegas and one of the biggest collectors in the space dealing world. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: It Came From Outer Space
programme.desc: A spaceship from another world crashes in the rural Arizona desert. An amateur stargazer and a schoolteacher suspect alien influence when the local townsfolk begin to act strange. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Award Winning Space Movies
programme.desc: Space Channel Presents Cinespace, an partnership between The Houston Cinematic Arts Society and NASA. These are award winning movies that will definitely inspire. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Santa Clause Conquers the Martians
programme.desc: Santa has been kidnapped, by Martians! Saint Nick has been taken to bring Christmas cheer to the children of Mars, but some saboteurs have other plans. Duration: 5400

programme.title: Cinespace Short Films
programme.desc: A short film competition that offers filmmakers, editors, and animators around the world a chance to share their works inspired by, and using actual NASA imagery. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Planets with David Becker
programme.desc: For more than three decades, Grammy and Emmy nominated guitarist, composer, producer David Becker has continued to define himself as one of the best and most unique voices in jazz and contemporary music by combining diverse influences and a passion for the new and different, and his ability to play for the present while always keeping an eye on the past and future. He has led the critically acclaimed DAVID BECKER TRIBUNE to a worldwide audience by performing in more than 35 countries. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Universe
programme.desc: Welcome to Space Channel Universe! Bringing you the highlights of latest news, entertainment, launch coverage and so much more! Sit back and enjoy Space Channel Universe. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Universe
programme.desc: Join us as we travel through the Space Channel Universe and experience the Final Frontier like never before. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Monolith Monsters
programme.desc: Rocks from a meteor grows and threatens a sleepy Southwestern desert community. It must be stopped or Los Angeles is in big trouble! Duration: 5400

programme.title: The Ultimate Penthouse
programme.desc: Space Tourist takes us out of this world to a company making plans to build a hotel in space as well as those closer to home. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Astral Travel
programme.desc: Astral Travel is an intentional out-of-body experience that assumes the existence of a soul called an "astral body" that is separate from the physical body and capable of traveling outside it throughout the universe. Duration: 7200
